name: lethal board game
description:
Lethal Quick survival board game. 

Movement is lethal on this board game. Find the path to the exit. 

30 possibilities of death /100.

To give you  a chance to survive to this challenge, the little guy has 3 sensors: front, left  and right, so you hear a sound when you are closed to a trap. 

all controls: gamepad, mobile, keyboard.
